languages.text: {n}На мгновение злая ухмылка становится менее искренней, и кровожадный пленник пристально и испытующе вглядывается в ваше лицо, будто пытается разглядеть ваши мысли.{/n}
{n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение злая ухмылка становится менее искренней, и кровожадный пленник пристально и испытующе вглядывается в ваше лицо, будто пытается разглядеть ваши мысли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，他脸上恶毒的笑容消散了一些。这位嗜血的囚犯以紧张而审视的目光打量着你的脸，仿佛在试着看穿你的想法一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，他脸上恶毒的笑容消散了一些。这位嗜血的囚犯以紧张而审视的目光打量着你的脸，仿佛在试着看穿你的想法一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}凶悪な笑みは一瞬だけ誠意を失い、血に飢えた囚人はこちらの考えを読み取ろうとするかのように、こちらの顔を強烈に観察するような目で見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}凶悪な笑みは一瞬だけ誠意を失い、血に飢えた囚人はこちらの考えを読み取ろうとするかのように、こちらの顔を強烈に観察するような目で見る。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Por un momento, la sonrisa salvaje pierde algo de sinceridad y el sanguinario prisionero te estudia como si quisiera leer tus pensamientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un momento, la sonrisa salvaje pierde algo de sinceridad y el sanguinario prisionero te estudia como si quisiera leer tus pensamientos.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, le rictus perd un peu de sa sincérité et le prisonnier vous dévisage intensément, comme s'il essayait de lire dans vos pensées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, le rictus perd un peu de sa sincérité et le prisonnier vous dévisage intensément, comme s'il essayait de lire dans vos pensées.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Für einen Augenblick verliert das bösartige Grinsen an Aufrichtigkeit, und der blutrünstige Gefangene sieht dir intensiv und prüfend ins Gesicht, als wolle er deine Gedanken lesen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einen Augenblick verliert das bösartige Grinsen an Aufrichtigkeit, und der blutrünstige Gefangene sieht dir intensiv und prüfend ins Gesicht, als wolle er deine Gedanken lesen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Acımasız gülüşü, bir anlığına içtenliğini yitiriyor. Kana susamış mahkûm, düşüncelerini okumaya çalışıyormuşçasına yüzünü irdeleyen, şiddetli bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the vicious grin loses some of its sincerity and the bloodthirsty prisoner casts an intense, scrutinising look at your face, as if trying to read your thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Acımasız gülüşü, bir anlığına içtenliğini yitiriyor ve kana susamış mahkûm, düşüncelerini okumaya çalışıyormuş misali yüzüne şiddetli bir irdelemeyle bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
